message: Sound advice, thanks! The async/await mindset is yielding major improvements in code readability and performance for me, and I'm sure everyone else. It really feels like the "right way" to do asynchrony... especially since it separates the concepts of asynchrony and multi-threading. Some of the TPL code I was so proud of a few years ago feels like an embarrassment in my codebase now, hah... not all of it, TPL is great when used for what it was designed for.
